about_the_game:
Axilon: Legend of Artifacts - Prologue is an action linear game with RPG elements.

The game is set in the world of Axilon, which consists of many kingdoms living in peace and harmony. However, the delicate balance of the world is targeted by the dark lord Cyrus.
The main character is a young guy - Alvutar, who will have to go through numerous trials of fate, achieve mastery of weapons and magic, and also protect the world from Cyrus and his minions.

Features of the game:
  • World - Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the Axilon. Explore three highly detailed locations - forest, caves and a snowy valley - and do everything possible to survive

  • Gameplay -Improve your sword, shield and magic skills. Learn to competently combine weapons. Choose your favorite fighting style and upgrade it. There are no useless skills here.

  • A variety of enemies - trolls, goblins, spiders Each monster you meet has unique attacks and skills.

This experimental game is created with pure enthusiasm without any funding and does not compete with any big games.

content_descriptors.notes: In this game we kill monsters and therefore blood is present.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.3 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 760 or AMD HD 8800 4000 or greater. Laptop versions of these chipsets may not be supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required.
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6GB), NVIDIA GeForce 970 (4GB), AMD RX 480 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Axilon: Legend of Artifacts - Prologue is a short linear corridor first-person fantasy action RPG game. Awaken your true power and resist the forces of evil that are trying to destroy your world.

English*, Russian*, Azerbaijani*
